home.description:
The first Brazilian fanbase dedicated to actresses Emi Thasorn and Bonnie Pattraphus ‚Äî updates, official links, fun facts and everything about this Thai GL phenomenon.

Here you will find translations, full content and news always prepared with a lot of love and dedication. üíúüß°

Stay tuned to our socials:

‚Äî Twitter: we help with tags, trends and engagement to support EmiBonnie every day.
‚Äî YouTube: we post interviews, lives and compilation videos with English subtitles featuring the best fanmeeting moments.
‚Äî TikTok: constant videos so no one misses any news about the girls.
‚Äî Instagram: we share photos, short videos and also support their sponsored posts by liking, commenting and sharing.
‚Äî Telegram: we have already released 14 subtitled episodes of MouseTH, and the remaining 6 will be coming soon.

If you want to suggest content or request something specific, we are always available. The admins work hard to keep everything accessible and to help more and more people discover and follow EmiBonnie.

emi.title: Emi Thasorn üß°
emi.intro_sign: Zodiac sign: Taurus (Aries in the Thai zodiac).
emi.intro_jobs: Occupations: actress, singer, model, and host. Active since 2020.
emi.intro_education: Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Communication Arts from the Faculty of Information and Communication Technology, Silpakorn University.
emi.intro_p1: Emi is a Thai actress of Chinese-Thai descent who began her career as an extra in 2020. She entered the entertainment industry after searching for a part-time job on Facebook and finding an advertisement for background actors in the series Why R U? (2020).
emi.intro_p2: In 2021, she gained recognition for her role as ‚ÄúNana‚Äù in the second season of Girl from Nowhere, a performance that drew attention for her dramatic talent. That same year, she made her film debut in The Whole Truth, portraying Paew.
emi.intro_p3: Emi landed her first leading role as Aim-Orn, a student who becomes beautiful overnight, in the horror anthology series School Tales The Series (2022). That same year, she portrayed Mint in 609 Bedtime Story.
emi.intro_p4: In 2023, she played Meena in the film Hoon Payon. After appearing in several television series, she signed with GMMTV, and her first project under the new agency was the role of Pla in the series Last Twilight (2023).
emi.intro_p5: In 2024, Emi appeared in Intern in My Heart. She then portrayed Ann, an androgynous character who befriends Guy (Metawin Opas-iamkajorn), the male lead of Beauty Newbie (2024). Later, she took on multiple roles across different series, including Yeepun in Perfect 10 Liners (2024).
emi.intro_p6: In 2025, she gained even greater recognition for her sapphic leading role in the Thai GL series Us (2025), alongside Bonnie Pattraphus Borattasuwan.
emi.intro_p7: Also in 2025, she expanded her filmography by participating in various genres and formats. She made a special appearance as Baimon, also known as ‚ÄúMon‚Äù, in episode 4 of Break Up Service, and took on the leading role of Phicha in the series Mouse.
emi.intro_p8: Emi also starred in the series Friendshit Forever (2025) as Tulip, reinforcing her presence as a lead actress in contemporary productions. At the same time, she joined the cast of Burnout Syndrome (2025) as Ing, in a supporting role that added another dramatic layer to her career and further solidified her evolution as an actress.
emi.section_facts_p1: üí° She owns her own brand called IMM ANOTHER {IMMANOTHER IG} {IMMANOTHER X}
emi.section_facts_p2: üí° Favorite foods: fried noodles, apple, sweet green mango, and strawberry
emi.section_facts_p4: üí° Emi dislikes yellow-colored foods because, according to her, they are usually soft or mushy
emi.section_facts_p5: üí° Emi has been caught several times joining live streams of card sellers to buy Bonnie cards and Secrets cards
emi.section_facts_p6: üí° Emi started playing PUBG because of Bonnie, but now she is just as addicted as Bonnie

bonnie.intro_sign: Zodiac sign: Aquarius (Capricorn in the Thai zodiac).
bonnie.intro_jobs: Professions: actress, singer, model, and host. Active since 2024.
bonnie.intro_education: Education: currently studying Cyber Business Management at the Faculty of Innovation in Social Communication, Srinakharinwirot University.
bonnie.intro_p1: Bonnie began her career working as a model for several local brands while she was still a student. She stood out for her work as a model and brand ambassador for TWENTYWENDY, the cosmetics brand founded by Thai actress Love Pattranite Limpatiyakorn.
bonnie.intro_p2: In 2023, Bonnie was discovered by a casting agent through social media and was invited to an acting audition. After passing the audition, she signed a contract with GMMTV. Her debut under the new agency was a supporting role as Peeta in the television series High School Frenemy (2024).
bonnie.intro_p3: In 2025, she gained wider recognition for her leading sapphic role in the Thai GL series Us (2025), alongside Emi Thasorn Klinnium.
bonnie.intro_p4: She also received praise for her supporting role as Lookplub, Peach‚Äôs younger sister, in the television series Me and Thee (2025).
bonnie.section_facts_p1: üí° She has her own brand called VURV.BKK {VURV IG} {VURV X}
bonnie.section_facts_p2: üí° Favorite foods: spicy food, salmon, shabu, and strawberries
bonnie.section_facts_p4: üí° Bonnie does not eat beef due to religious preferences (Buddhism)
bonnie.section_facts_p5: üí° Bonnie loves anime and has recommended several, such as Hunter x Hunter, Haikyuu, and Demon Slayer
bonnie.section_facts_p6: üí° Bonnie enjoys playing mobile games like PUBG and often tries to play with Emi, ANY, and her fans

fanbase.title: About the EmiBonnie Brasil fanbase
fanbase.p1: EmiBonnie Brasil is the first Brazilian fanbase dedicated exclusively to actresses Emi Thasorn and Bonnie Pattraphus, bringing updates, official content, fun facts, and everything about this Thai GL phenomenon.
fanbase.p2: Our goal is to support, promote, and celebrate their journey with responsibility and a lot of love. Here you will find full translations, photos, videos, livestreams, interviews, special projects, and everything created with dedication by the admins.
fanbase.p3:
‚Äî Twitter / X: we help with tags, trends, and engagement to support EmiBonnie every day.
‚Äî YouTube: we post interviews, livestreams, and compilations with English subtitles.
‚Äî TikTok: frequent videos so no one misses any updates about the girls.
‚Äî Instagram: photos, short videos, and support for their sponsored posts.
‚Äî Telegram: we have already published 14 subtitled episodes of MouseTH, with the remaining 6 coming soon.

If you want to suggest content or request something specific, we are always available.
fanbase.p4: Our commitment is to strengthen the Brazilian fandom, create a welcoming environment, and ensure that all fans have access to information with quality, organization, and a lot of love.
fanbase.p5: Thank you for being part of EmiBonnie Brasil. You make all of this possible! üß°üíú

projects.title: üß° EmiBonnie Brasil Projects üíú
projects.intro: Here we gather all projects organized by EmiBonnie Brasil, including ongoing initiatives and completed projects.
projects.completed_empty:
We don‚Äôt have any completed projects yet.
This space will tell our story very soon üß°üíú
projects.bonnie_desc:
This project was created to represent all the love and affection of Brazilian fans on Bonnie‚Äôs birthday. Initially, the plan included a money bouquet, two gifts, a banner, and a booth.
However, due to differences in the bouquet‚Äôs cost, we decided to give up that part and focus our efforts on the gifts, the banner, and the booth.
In the end, everything turned out even better than expected. There were many sleepless nights, countless conversations with shops, print houses, and suppliers, as well as the creation of the artwork and the organization of every detail, so that everything would flow in the best possible way.
Seeing the project completed and delivered with so much care made every effort truly worth it.
projects.love_session_banner_booth_desc:
After the conclusion of the birthday project, we started this new initiative to represent Brazilian fans at the Love Session event.
The goal is to create a commemorative banner and an event booth, following the same standard of care and dedication as our previous project.
The artworks are being developed on a schedule that allows enough time for review, graphic production, and delivery before the event.
Fundraising remains open until February 28th, with a defined goal to ensure the full execution of the project.
Every contribution makes a difference.
As always, the entire process will be handled with total transparency, and all updates, receipts, and project stages will be shared with fans.
We sincerely thank everyone who continues to support and trust our work in representing Brazilian fans üß°üíú
projects.love_session_buque_desc:
This is a collaborative project between Latin American fanbases, created with the goal of sending a money bouquet to the Love Session event, which will take place on March 7th. The participating fanbases joined forces to represent the affection and unity of Latin fans during this special moment.
The project offers different bouquet options, which vary according to the total amount raised, ranging from simpler models to a premium option with a customized stand.
The final choice will be determined based on the achieved goal, always through dialogue between fanbases and with full transparency throughout the process.
Every contribution matters, regardless of the amount.
This project symbolizes unity, collaboration, and collective dedication to represent Latin American fans in the best possible way üß°üíú
projects.food_support_moonshadow_desc:
The Moonshadow Food Support Project is an initiative organized to send food and drinks to the cast and staff during filming days, as a way to show support, care, and encouragement for their work.
The project will operate through a waiting list of a recommended restaurant experienced in handling food supports.
Due to the long queue and the fact that filming is scheduled for a later date, this will be a long-term project that requires planning and patience.
Donations will remain open for approximately three to four months, with no fixed deadline at the moment, as we await official confirmation of the food support date.
The total cost may vary depending on the quantity and type of food selected, with an initial focus on the lower goal to assess the project's feasibility.
As this is a higher-cost initiative, it will be treated as a test project.
All updates, decisions, and expenses will be shared with full transparency, always with great care to represent Brazilian fans üß°üíú
projects.completed_message:
The final result of this project filled us with pride.
Our banner and booth were placed together with the others in the main area, and the gift was displayed on the gift table alongside the rest.
Bonnie stood next to our banner and booth, posed for photos, and even made a bow as a gesture of gratitude, making this moment even more special.
It wasn‚Äôt just her who felt happy, we were all deeply fulfilled seeing this project come to life in such a beautiful way üß°üíú
projects.lottery_message:
We sincerely thank everyone who contributed to this project üíñ.
The giveaway was an initiative organized by the admins not only to help with donations, but mainly as a way to show appreciation for all the support and love we received.
If it were possible, everyone would be a winner, but unfortunately we had a limited number of cards available for the giveaway.
Even so, every participation was extremely important in making this project a reality üß°üíú

series.emotional: The Emotional Soundtrack of Us The Series
series.intro:
Explore a universe of narratives, emotions, and behind-the-scenes glimpses.
Here you'll find every series that reveals the talent and journey of EmiBonnie.
series.cast-text:
Protagonists
‚Ä¢ Pam ‚Äî Emi Thasorn Klinnium
‚Ä¢ Dokrak ‚Äî Bonnie Pattraphus Borattasuwan

Friends / Support
‚Ä¢ Oat ‚Äî View Benyapa Jeenprasom
‚Ä¢ Nene ‚Äî Mim Rattanawadee Wongthong
‚Ä¢ Aek ‚Äî Leo Saussay
‚Ä¢ Peem ‚Äî Soodyacht Patsit Permpoonsavat
‚Ä¢ Natcha ‚Äî Samantha Melanie Coates
‚Ä¢ Titang ‚Äî Pumpkin
‚Ä¢ Koi ‚Äî Singha Luangsuntorn (Episode 9)

Family
‚Ä¢ Kawi (Dokrak‚Äôs brother) ‚Äî Sing Harit Cheewagaroon
‚Ä¢ Khem (Dokrak‚Äôs father) ‚Äî Jab Penpetch Benyakul
‚Ä¢ Orn (Dokrak‚Äôs mother) ‚Äî Pupae Ramavadee Nakchudtree
‚Ä¢ Bua (Pam‚Äôs grandmother) ‚Äî Nid Sansanee Wattananukul
series.script-text:
Direction: Kanittha Kwunyoo ‚Äî Production Director.

Origin:
Based on the novel of the same name by author Chao Planoy.

Screenwriters:
Naphat Chitveerapat
Lalil Kittitanaphan
Nichaphat Buranadilok
series.emotionalUP: THE EMOTIONAL SOUNDTRACK OF US THE SERIES
series.emotional-text:
In Us, the music doesn't just accompany the story; it speaks for Pam and Dokrak when they don't provide it. Each track carries a distinct emotional point of view, transforming the soundtrack into an extension of the narrative.
Kissing Out Of Dream, sung by SIN, occupies a very special place in this GL. There's a scene where Dokrak sings this song with Pam present. As Dokrak sings, Pam begins to react physically, and then comes the key moment when the lyrics speak directly to the heart; Dokrak looks at Pam.
Pam instinctively puts her hand to her chest.
The sound of the scene makes this clear: her heartbeat becomes erratic.

The lyrics of Kissing Out Of Dream speak of feelings that seem unreal, as if they belong to a dream; it's a love that shouldn't exist but insists on manifesting itself through the body before reason.
That's exactly what happens to Pam at that moment. She still doesn't verbalize her feelings for Dokrak, but her body reacted first. Her heart betrays what her mind tries to control. The music here becomes an indirect confession.

Between Us is the exact translation of what Dokrak feels and doesn't know how to express.
Recorded by Bonnie on Christmas Eve, the song carries a silent emotional weight, almost like a secret.
The MV presents delicate and affectionate scenes that don't appear in the GL, and that's no coincidence. They represent everything Dokrak wanted to experience with Pam at that moment in the story, but couldn't. Not for lack of love, but for fear and emotions.
It's a video about contained desire, about imagining a life that can't yet be real.

If Between Us is a doubt, More Than Words is a certainty. Emi's song represents Pam's feelings towards Dokrak: a genuine, calm, and deep love.
Pam didn't know she needed this love.
But that's exactly what saved her.
More Than Words is about that which goes beyond what can be said, beyond fear and situations. It's love in its purest form.
series.conection-text:
One of the greatest strengths of Us The Series is how naturally Pam and Dokrak come to life. Emi and Bonnie have mentioned that although there was a defined script, many scenes were born from improvisation.
The director allowed them to go beyond the text, trusting their connection.
Iconic moments such as the watermelon scene and Dokrak shyly covering her mouth were born from that freedom.
series.titlesep-text:
At times, Us The Series chooses not to explain everything; it relies on glances, small gestures, and music, an example of which is in the episode titles.

EP.01 ‚Äî ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏£‡∏±‡∏Å (I Lie Because I Love You)

This title already sets the tone for the series. 'Lying for love.' It reflects the central dynamic of GL about feelings that exist before the courage to acknowledge them. It also engages with some scenes about loving in silence and hiding what you feel so as not to lose the other person.

EP.02 ‚Äî ‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏®‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏£‡πå‡πÄ‡∏®‡∏£‡πâ (A Lonely Friday Night)

A direct reference to the melancholic mood of the series and the concept of 'sad Friday,' very common in Thai song lyrics about loneliness. Here, the episode translates shared loneliness.

EP.03 ‚Äî ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏©‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏±‡∏Å (I‚Äôm Sorry I Said I Love You)

This title is inspired by Thai song lyrics, where apologizing for love carries guilt, fear, and inadequacy.
In GL, it represents the moment when feeling love seems wrong, not because it's forbidden, but because it wasn't the 'right time.'

EP.04 ‚Äî ‡∏ã‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ß‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏à (Hidden in My Heart)

A classic title for Thai romantic ballads. Here, it symbolizes everything that Pam and Dokrak know but don't say. The love between them exists, but remains hidden.

EP.05 ‚Äî ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏£‡∏±‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö (Love in Secret)

Another title strongly associated with romantic lyrics. The episode speaks of a love that is already emotionally real, but cannot yet exist publicly.

EP.06 ‚Äî ‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏£‡∏±‡∏Å ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ ‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏≤ (Is It Wrong to Love, or Are We the Ones Wrong?)

This title is almost a whole song phrase.
It expresses the central conflict of GL:
The problem is love‚Ä¶ or is it the world around us?

EP.07 ‚Äî ‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô (Going Home)

‚ÄúGoing home‚Äù here isn‚Äôt just physical.
It‚Äôs about returning to oneself, facing old feelings, and understanding where one belongs emotionally.

EP.08 ‚Äî ‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏à‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ß (A House Without a Kitchen)

One of the most symbolic titles of the series.
In Thai culture, a house without a kitchen is incomplete, a place where life is not built.
The episode talks about relationships that exist, but are not yet a home.

EP.09 ‚Äî ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡πÇ‡∏ó‡∏© (An Apology)

This title echoes countless Thai songs about regret. Here, the apology isn't just for actions, it's for not having had the courage before.

EP.10 ‚Äî ‡∏ú‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏û‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ú‡∏• (Bandage)

‚ÄúBandage‚Äù as an emotional metaphor. The episode is full of reconciliation and speaks of love as something that doesn't erase wounds, but helps them heal.

EP.11 ‚Äî ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏≤ (Our Love)

This is the most beautiful title and is central to the series' identity. It transforms individual love into something shared. It's not 'my love' or 'your love'. It's our love!

EP.12 ‚Äî ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤...‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà (Goodbye‚Ä¶ So We Can Begin Again)

A typical closing ballad title.
It doesn't talk about endings, but about new things.
Closing cycles, abandoning fears, and finally allowing love to exist without excuses.

The choice of titles inspired by song lyrics is no coincidence.
Us The Series builds its narrative like a long song where each episode is a verse, each silence is an unsung chorus.
The series is beautiful and sounds like it feels.
series.ep1-text: Pam tries to focus on her studies and the controlled routine she created for herself, but Dokrak‚Äôs arrival begins to shake her defenses. A connection starts to bloom.
series.ep2-text: Dokrak‚Äôs interest in Pam grows quietly as she tries to balance her feelings within the limits of friendship.
series.ep3-text: Dokrak‚Äôs brother Kawi falls for Pam at first sight and asks for her help. Dokrak agrees while struggling with her own emotions.
series.ep4-text: Emotions grow more complicated as Dokrak faces a dilemma between supporting her brother and hiding her true feelings.
series.ep5-text: Pam‚Äôs past resurfaces, creating subtle tensions and internal conflicts.
series.ep6-text: Amid emotional chaos, Pam finds the courage to confess her feelings to Dokrak.
series.ep7-text: Pam and Dokrak share more intimate moments while confronting family wounds.
series.ep8-text: Dokrak faces the weight of confessing her truth and awaiting a response.
series.ep9-text: A chapter of difficult choices and emotional revelations.
series.ep10-text: Pam and Dokrak confront the limits of their intimacy while dealing with family urgency.
series.ep11-text: Pam confronts her past while Dokrak reflects on her worth. Their emotional support becomes essential.
series.ep12-text: Pam and Dokrak officially unite, opening a new hopeful chapter in their story.
series.bts-text: In this behind-the-scenes special, the cast of Us talks about the creation of the series and their characters.
series.castms-text:
Protagonists
‚Ä¢ Chan ‚Äî Emi Thasorn Klinnium
‚Ä¢ Key ‚Äî Bonnie Pattraphus Borattasuwan
‚Ä¢ Jay ‚Äî Film Rachanun Mahawan
series.pilot-text:
After a painful breakup, Chan, owner of a cozy bar, closes her heart to love. Everything changes when Key, a bold young singer, enters her life and openly declares she wants to be her sugar baby.

What begins as a physical relationship slowly turns deeper as feelings become undeniable.
